name: Speedy Chaos
description:
Instructions:

WASD to move. Look around with the mouse. Space to jump.  Try not to fall off the edge!

Goal: Get to the last platform as fast as you can!

Description:

This was my fist time competing in a game jam, I had a lot of fun making this with my brother.

Credits:

I got the First-Person-Controller from the Unity Standard Assets.

Big thanks to Burger Studios for helping a bunch with this game including, music, bug-fixing, a bit of code and thumbnail art
